_header: O what a treasure is love certain

BodAsh176.Transcription:
O what a treasure ys love certeynewhen hertes be sped & cannot
                    refraynemy ladye loveth me well my ioy no tong can tell in her ys
                    petye & no disdayne
BodAsh176.Editions:
Wagner,  B. M. 
             “New Songs of the Reign of Henry VIII.” 
             Modern Language Notes
         50 (1935): 452-55: 455.
